sources.title: Bearry | Full Movie | Murder Romance | Valentine's Day 2023!
sources.description:
Bearry - In order to cheer up recently divorced Chloe, her friend, Sam gives her a giant teddy bear, Bearry. As Chloe confides her wishes to Bearry, people close to her go missing or die. Is Chloe a murderer, is it her stalker? or is it Bearry?
2021.  Stars: Sarah French, Thomas Haley, Charles Chudabala
